result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angelo J Scott

records.addlTxt: Defn in custody; Atty Cornia withdrew on 9-6-22 and SPD has not reappointed as of yet; time limits previously waived; preliminary hearing to be set after appointment of counsel

Defendant Angelo J Scott in court, in custody.  Attorney Reed Cornia in court for Angelo J Scott.  Attorney Lillian Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Defn wishes to have a new atty appointed. Colloquy w/ defn. Defn advised of rights and right to an atty. CT makes findings and allows Atty Cornia to withdraw. CT orders SPD to appoint successor counsel. CT directs Atty Cornia to cooperate with the transfer of the file. SPD notified f/w.
Status conference scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
for continuance filed by Atty Cornia
Preliminary hearing on August 23, 2022 at 09:30 am.
01:28 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Reed Cornia.  Trisha L Simmons appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on July 11, 2022 at 01:20 pm.

02:37 PM Defendant in court, in custody.  Will R Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Angelo J Scott appeared by video means.    Defendant has applied for SPD, but no one is appointed yet.  Case rescheduled.  Status conference scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 01:20 pm.
Status conference on April 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall complete the booking/fingerprinting process if required. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Thomas V. 
- Defendant shall not be in the 1300 block of Prairie Rd in Madison. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 2

02:09 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Amy M Johnson.  Cecilia E DeMarco appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
